metadata.title: CVE-2017-18205 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
In builtin.c in zsh before 5.4, when sh compatibility mode is used, thereis a NULL pointer dereference during processing of the cd command with noargument if HOME is not set.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-18205` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

zsh - 5.1.1-1ubuntu2.1
zsh-common - 5.1.1-1ubuntu2.1
zsh-static - 5.1.1-1ubuntu2.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: zsh package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.1.1-1ubuntu2.1').
